attributes.action: Organise flights to repatriate Britons stuck in Bali
attributes.additional_details: Bali does not have the ability to test for Coronavirus and has to send tests to Jakarta. They are not properly equipped for the Coronavirus outbreak and according to latest numbers there are 6000 Britons stuck in Bali, where one woman has unfortunately already passed away.
attributes.background: Organise flights to repatriate Britons to the UK as most flights back go through Singapore or the UAE and all flights through these countries have been stopped.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/307260

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
